definition: to apply (paint etc)/to smear/to daub/to blot out/to scribble/to scrawl/(literary) mud/street

sentences.english: They used pitch to cover roofs.
Vitamin E aids in the formation of the crystalline fat that coats each cell.
sentences.chinese: 維生素E幫助形成塗蓋每一個細胞的水晶脂肪。

sentences.english: Epoxy Heavy Coating, with handwheel. Fig. 5207
sentences.chinese: 塗蓋多層環氧樹脂，附手輪。
